"Another Brick in the Wall" is the title of three songs set to variations of the same 
basic theme, on Pink Floyd's 1979 rock opera, The Wall, subtitled Part 1 (working 
title "Reminiscing"), Part 2 (working title "Education"), and Part 3 (working title "
Drugs"). All parts were written by Pink Floyd's bassist, Roger Waters. ... For Part II,
